extendedInfo.description: This is my first android application so don't expect much for the time being. So far, it allows for the maintenance of multiple shopping lists, keeping track of the total cost of groceries while shopping. - Built for cupcake.- Suggestions are welcome.

reviews.comment: Super easy. Rated above average since you can create multiple lists (rare!) Since it has auto calculate, you could even figure a budget w this. Thx!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is just what i was looking for! Would be great with one simple add. Add a tax ratio option and i wouldnt have to go to my calculator and refigure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only app that adds up total. But needs a check box. Also i hate typing the same thing in multiple lists like milk so maybe a \"copy item\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just used ultimate shopping list for first time at the store and it works great it even added the taxes onto what i bought before i bought it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great start but needs check off of items and ability to share lists.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: works well & adds prices. Need checkbox option to add or remove item price to the total sum. Not enough space here to be specific. Good app though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use, keep budget
reviews.comment: I read the reviews about not being able to check stuff off but I downloaded anyway. For me, once I pick out an item & fill in price I know I got that item. Also, to add a list/item just hit ur utility button on ur phone.
reviews.author: Kimberly Kaste

reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome App
reviews.comment: I started using this app last week and I love it. The list are easy to add and I love how it adds my total before I get to the register ... no more going over-board on the spending with this one. Yes a check off would be nice but it functions just great as is. This one is definitely a keeper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, flat file, no frills.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I downloaded this app and all I get is a screen with: \"No Lists\". My phone is Motorola Droid 2 running 2.2.20. Any suggestions?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It should have had an option to check what ws purchased, then a four star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Liked it, but no way to check off items...so kind of pointless for me. carol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. Does need a check off option. Love that i had my exact total before getting to the register, before tax of course. Moto Cliq
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: just what i was looking for. Love the way to keep a total. Yes i agree a checkoff feature is needed as well but its a great start!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple and sweet, helps us keep a running total of our grocery bill.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs keypad for entering prices while shopping. Single click to enter price and voice recognition of prices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It could use a check off button. Other than that i like it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is GREAT!!! awesome job, does need a check off box or strike through. -MyTouch 3g fender
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: All it says is no list needs work
reviews.author: A Google User
